stmt.name: create_test_table1
stmt.sql: CREATE TABLE test_table1 ( col1 INT, col2 INT, col3 DECIMAL(10, 2) )

stmt.name: create_test_table2
stmt.sql: CREATE TABLE test_table2 ( col4 INT, col5 VARCHAR(50) )

stmt.name: select_2
stmt.sql: WITH cte1 AS ( SELECT col2, AVG(col3) AS col6 FROM test_table1 GROUP BY col2 ), cte2 AS ( SELECT t2.col4, t2.col5, c1.col6 FROM test_table2 t2 JOIN cte1 c1 ON t2.col4 = c1.col2 WHERE c1.col6 > @some_value ) SELECT * FROM cte2
